graph_title: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
indicator_name: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
SDG_GOAL: Goal 7: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 7.1: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 7.1.2: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
STAT_CONC_DEF:
This indicator measures the proportion of the population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology.

Countries classified as “High Income” based on the World Bank Country and Lending Groups are assumed to reach universal access from the first year the country joined the category.
DATA_COMP: Data were readily available to report on this indicator as specified by the metadata. Please refer to the sources to access additional information on the metadata or source.
